message: Let's start with a fair deal.  I'll take 90% and leave you 10%, but we can adjust in the future.
I think a 55/45 split is a fair starting point.  Let's see if we can agree on that.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40.  I'll take 60%, and you can have 40%. This is a good deal for both of us considering the inflation.
